cab.content: /Special fork of the Local Government Board for the Week ended August 17th, 1917.1. Conferences have been held to discuss amendments to the Representation of the People Bill and considerable progress has been made with the Bill in Committee.2. The subject of Housing is continuing to receive close attention and further meetings of the Advisory Conference and of the Housing (Building Construction) Committee have been held.3. Steps are being taken with a view to the appointment of a Commissioner for the purpose of encouraging local co-operation among tradesmen with a view to the avoidance of hardship on the part of sole proprietors of businesses liberated for military service.
